About LifeSportsUSA

LifeSportsUSA was created to offer a premium field sports and healthy lifestyle experience for youth, adults and their families. With several locations planned, LifeSportsUSA will become a regional sports destination in major US metropolitan areas.

FIELD SPORTS

  • State-of-the-art amenities (newest generation turf) and safest field hermetically (infill less, Turf Aid, spectator protection)
  • Indoor and outdoor fields, climate-controlled
  • Youth and adult teams and leagues
  • Competitive national and regional tournaments for soccer, lacrosse and field hockey

SPECIAL SPORTS PROGRAMMING

  • World class clinics and camps featuring top regional and nationally recognized athletes and coaches
  • Youth instruction, early childhood development and speed and agility training
  • Special major league sports events, sports celebrity camps and clinics
  • Partnerships with field sports NGBs, youth sports organizations and local tournament organizers
  • Mommy & Me classes

SPECTATOR VIEWING

  • Great seats on the sidelines as well as multiple viewing areas in the Core Building (a multi-story central facility inspired by ESPN Wide World of Sports at the Walt Disney World Resort)
  • Field cams broadcasting the action on flat screen monitors throughout the complex
  • LED screens with times and locations for youth and adult league games and practices

BROADCAST EXPERIENCE

  • Fully operational, on-site broadcast studio with field cams
  • Shooting footage to distribute to local news, regional and national networks
  • Original sports programming and more
  • Guest access to the broadcast studio to experience being a sportscaster (green screen photo opportunities)

DIGITAL TECHNOLOGY

  • Website/smartphone app to check game and practice schedules, see line-ups/positions for teams
  • Real time streaming video feeds to watch games remotely
  • RFID wristbands function as security devices and electronic IDs (locate your children in real time throughout the complex, use wristbands for wallet-free purchases like debit cards, and use them as your key to lockers, equipment rooms and other special access areas)

GUEST AMENITIES

  • Culinary excellence: A wide range of food and beverage options, from a fresh fruit and smoothie bar to a sports-themed cafe, all with a focus on healthy eating and nutritional education
  • Retail area: An ancillary retail section focusing exclusively on sports, health and nutrition, including a vitamin store, organic produce and sporting goods
  • Health and wellness: An on-site sports medicine and wellness center, weight loss clinic, nail and hair salon
